movie_title: The benefits of doing nothing ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: Some animals evolved to do nothing. And if it’s good enough for animals, would being lazy work for h

vocabulary.example: Ants are known for being industrious creatures, constantly working to build and maintain their colonies.

vocabulary.definition: a group of animals, especially ants, bees, or birds, that live together
vocabulary.example: The colony of ants worked together to gather food and protect their queen.

vocabulary.definition: able to produce a lot for the amount of resources used
vocabulary.example: The key to a successful business is having a productive team that can deliver high-quality work efficiently.

vocabulary.definition: a short, well-known saying that expresses a common truth or belief
vocabulary.example: The proverb 'all good things must come to an end' reminds us that enjoyable experiences eventually finish.

vocabulary.definition: the state or fact of being required or indispensable
vocabulary.example: In times of necessity, people often find creative solutions to overcome challenges.

vocabulary.definition: to stop worrying or thinking about something and relax
vocabulary.example: After a long day at work, she likes to switch off by listening to music and taking a hot bath.
